wsp_compliance.wsp_96: MCP Governance - HoloIndex, Vision DAE, Secrets MCP integration
wsp_compliance.wsp_48: Recursive Learning - Store patterns in ai_overseer/memory/

mission_objective: Setup autonomous GitHub → Cloud Build → Cloud Run deployment for GotJunk FoundUp

mission_context.desired_state: Automatic deployment when code pushed to GitHub main branch

tasks: Detect if Secret Manager secret exists (GEMINI_API_KEY_GOTJUNK)
Verify cloudbuild.yaml exists and is valid
Check if Cloud Build trigger already configured

phase_2_qwen_planning.role: Partner - Strategic coordination (starts simple, scales up)
tasks: Determine minimal steps to complete GitHub → Cloud Run automation
Identify which steps can be automated vs manual
Calculate token budget and risk assessment
phase_2_qwen_planning.expected_output: CoordinationPlan with ranked steps and automation strategy

tasks: Execute browser automation using FoundUpsDriver + Vision DAE
Supervise each step with Gemma validation checkpoints
Handle OAuth flows and manual interventions
Update Vision DAE with Cloud Console UI selectors
Record mission metrics (time, tokens, success rate)
Generate reusable skill for future FoundUp deployments
phase_4_learning.expected_output: Autonomous capability for future FoundUp deployments (zero 0102 intervention)

step_1.description: Connect GitHub repository to Cloud Build

step_3.description: Grant Cloud Build access to Secret Manager
step_3.reason: IAM permission UI requires careful navigation

step_5.description: Test deployment by pushing code change

success_criteria.github_connected: Repository connection visible in Cloud Build
success_criteria.permissions_granted: Cloud Build service account has Secret Accessor role
success_criteria.deployment_works: Git push triggers build and deploys to gotjunk-56566376153.us-west1.run.app

token_budget.comparison: Manual 0102 approach: 60-100K tokens (no learning, no reuse)

ai_overseer_advantages.qwen_strategic_planning: Breaks complex task into simple steps 012 can understand
ai_overseer_advantages.gemma_validation: Fast binary checks after each step (success/failure)
ai_overseer_advantages.pattern_learning: Future FoundUp deployments require ZERO manual intervention
ai_overseer_advantages.mcp_integration: Reuses existing infrastructure (Vision DAE, HoloIndex, Secrets)
ai_overseer_advantages.wsp_compliance: Proper domain organization, role assignment, documentation
